languages.text: "{name}". {n}Голос Ирлиэт, мелодичный и мягкий, окутывает спокойствием.{/n} "Что бы ни ждало нас впереди, я пройду этот пусть с тобой — до конца. Таково данное мной обещание. И воля моей души".

"{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."
languages.original_text: "{name}". {n}Голос Ирлиэт, мелодичный и мягкий, окутывает спокойствием.{/n} "Что бы ни ждало нас впереди, я пройду этот пусть с тобой — до конца. Таково данное мной обещание. И воля моей души".

traits.locale_text: "{name}". {n}Yrliet's voice is melodic and soft, almost enveloping you with calmness.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

"{name}". {n}Yrliet's voice is melodic and soft, almost enveloping you with calmness.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

"{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

"{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

"{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音柔和而充满韵律，让你的心灵充满了平静。{/n}“无论前往有什么等待着我们，我都会与你一起走到最后。这便是我的诺言，这便是我灵魂的意愿。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音柔和而充满韵律，让你的心灵充满了平静。{/n}“无论前往有什么等待着我们，我都会与你一起走到最后。这便是我的诺言，这便是我灵魂的意愿。”

languages.text: «{name}». {n}La voz de Yrliet, suave y melodiosa, te llena de calma.{/n} «No importa lo que nos espere más adelante: recorreré esta senda contigo hasta el final. Esa fue mi promesa y esa es la voluntad de mi alma».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}La voz de Yrliet, suave y melodiosa, te llena de calma.{/n} «No importa lo que nos espere más adelante: recorreré esta senda contigo hasta el final. Esa fue mi promesa y esa es la voluntad de mi alma».

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}ユリエットの声は柔らかい旋律のように響き、聴く者を穏やかな気持ちで包み込む。{/n}「この先何があろうとも、我はお前とともにこの道を最後まで歩もう。それが我の約束であり、魂の意志でもある」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}ユリエットの声は柔らかい旋律のように響き、聴く者を穏やかな気持ちで包み込む。{/n}「この先何があろうとも、我はお前とともにこの道を最後まで歩もう。それが我の約束であり、魂の意志でもある」

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Yrliets Stimme ist sanft und melodisch, umhüllt dich mit Frieden.{/n} "Was auch vor uns liegen mag, ich werde diesen Pfad bis zum Ende mit Euch beschreiten. Das war mein Versprechen, und das ist der Wille meiner Seele."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliets Stimme ist sanft und melodisch, umhüllt dich mit Frieden.{/n} "Was auch vor uns liegen mag, ich werde diesen Pfad bis zum Ende mit Euch beschreiten. Das war mein Versprechen, und das ist der Wille meiner Seele."

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}La voix douce et mélodieuse d'Yrliet vous enveloppe tel un cocon de sérénité.{/n} « Quoi que l'avenir nous réserve, je vous suivrai jusqu'au bout. Telle était ma promesse, et telle est la volonté de mon âme. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}La voix douce et mélodieuse d'Yrliet vous enveloppe tel un cocon de sérénité.{/n} « Quoi que l'avenir nous réserve, je vous suivrai jusqu'au bout. Telle était ma promesse, et telle est la volonté de mon âme. »

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet'in yumuşak ve melodik sesi sana kendini dingin hissettiriyor.{/n} "Bizi ne bekliyor olursa olsun, en sonuna kadar bu yolu seninle yürüyeceğim. Buna söz verdim ve ruhumun arzuladığı şey de tam olarak bu."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}Yrliet's voice is soft and melodic, enveloping you with calm.{/n} "No matter what lies ahead, I will walk this path with you to the end. Such was my promise, and such is the will of my soul."
